divs: Sighting DetailsWas on my Balcony around the time noted, was looking at the sky, and suddenly I saw a bullet looking bluish shape, very fast, came out of the blue, it was dark outside at night and still I could tell its color was blue, sparkling blue if could say that, and as it showed up it disappeared, and what scared me the most, there was an airplane above it, as I could tell from the angle, the plane kept going towards town. It was so fast and happened so quickly that I could not get the cam or the phone to take any pictures, and it didnt last long, no sounds or anything, just a blue light for few seconds, crossing the sky very fast, it crossed it what looked to me in a descending way, going down, and as if u blew on the candle, no more light and that was it !
Summary: It was blue color, flashing, very fast and didnt last long
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Quincy
There were no other sightings in Quincy on or around June 18th 2008
